channel.title: Surviving on Jiten Agarwal
channel.description: Recent content in Surviving on Jiten Agarwal

item.title: How to Survive a Corporate Shit Hole
item.description: Life is hard and it’s harder when you have a shitty job. My choices landed me in a shitty job too. I like to call myself a survivor and I try to bring the best of every situation I am in. Let’s start by defining what a CORPORATE SHIT HOLE and then you will know why it is not a good place to be. There are surely many type of Shit-holes but I have only experienced the one where people sit in front of computer and like to call themselves programmers.
